backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control, and creation and updates of image generation requests using multiple providers including ReplicateOrProxy.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old request/provider formats to the new ReplicateOrProxy-compatible structure while preserving stored state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new Replicate/Proxy-related frontend changes to feature IDs, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in generation, configuration, gallery, and proxy support.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component showing the generation form and gallery inside the layout.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Empty placeholder file for the login button component.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder file for the profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/Gallery/GalleryG: Gallery grid displaying the user's generation requests with loading, empty, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Gallery/Generati: Card component rendering a single generation request with preview, metadata, status handling, and download support.
frontend/src/components/Gallery/ImagePre: Renders an image from an ExternalBlob URL with basic load error handling.
frontend/src/components/Generator/Custom: UI form for configuring custom API endpoint, auth mode, and key with validation display.
frontend/src/components/Generator/Genera: Form to submit image generation prompts, choose provider, validate input, and trigger custom API generation.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppHeader: Header component showing app logo and title.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with header, textured background, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook to fetch the current user's profile via the actor with loading and fetch status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomApiConfig.ts: Manages custom API config with localStorage persistence and validation for URL and auth fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomApiGeneratio: Handles calling a custom API for generation and updating request status in backend with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/clear functions, and manages stored identity lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, generation requests, and updating or creating generation records.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global background/foreground styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/services/customApiClient.ts: Sends prompts to a custom API with selectable auth modes and returns image URLs or placeholders based on the response.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImage.ts: Generates a filename from request metadata and triggers a browser download of the generated image.
frontend/src/utils/placeholderImages.ts: Exports the placeholder image URL used when custom API responses contain bytes or base64 data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, OKLCH color variables, animations, and includes typography, container, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and a list of existing implemented features for the ICP app.
